price: 148. Mpe Allah apesaki bango mbano ya malamu awa na nsé mpe ya kitoko koleka o mokolo ya suka. Mpe Allah alingi bato ya malamu.
arabic: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
